entry.source: 〉 A man whom you guess to have a heavy{F801}accent is standing here...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 A man whom you guess to have a heavy{F801}accent is standing here...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Accented manager\0{F87A,111}{F813,0,130001}Mr. Tayama told me about you guys.{F801}You're {F843,0}, right?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Accented manager\0{F87A,111}{F813,0,130001}Mr. Tayama told me about you guys.{F801}You're {F843,0}, right?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,2,1,1}{F87B,5,10,1,2}{F813,0,130002}Is our fellow Samurai safe?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,2,1,1}{F87B,5,10,1,2}{F813,0,130002}Is our fellow Samurai safe?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Accented manager\0{F87A,111}{F813,0,130003}Your fellow...? Oh, the hostage?{F801}Sure he's safe.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Accented manager\0{F87A,111}{F813,0,130003}Your fellow...? Oh, the hostage?{F801}Sure he's safe.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,5}{F87B,5,2,1,1}{F813,0,130004}What would you have us do?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,5}{F87B,5,2,1,1}{F813,0,130004}What would you have us do?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Accented manager\0{F87A,111}{F813,0,130005}There's this demon inside Club Milton,{F801}Koga Saburo... Go beat 'im.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Accented manager\0{F87A,111}{F813,0,130005}There's this demon inside Club Milton,{F801}Koga Saburo... Go beat 'im.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 There is a demon standing in front of{F801}the entrance to Club Milton.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 There is a demon standing in front of{F801}the entrance to Club Milton.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Accented manager\0{F87A,111}{F813,0,130006}I heard from your Samurai pal that you{F801}guys are the rookies of the year, huh?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Accented manager\0{F87A,111}{F813,0,130006}I heard from your Samurai pal that you{F801}guys are the rookies of the year, huh?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,3,1,1}{F87B,5,10,1,2}{F813,0,130007}And why would you have us do this?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,3,1,1}{F87B,5,10,1,2}{F813,0,130007}And why would you have us do this?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Accented manager\0{F87A,111}{F813,0,130008}You think we're tellin' you? Just{F801}kill the bastard.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Accented manager\0{F87A,111}{F813,0,130008}You think we're tellin' you? Just{F801}kill the bastard.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,2,1,1}{F813,0,130009}Those accursed vermin...{F801}{F802}{F87B,3,7,1,2}{F813,0,130010}But no, anger won't solve this. We're{F801}fortunate it's a demon they want slain.{F801}Let us strike down this Koga Saburo.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,2,1,1}{F813,0,130009}Those accursed vermin...{F801}{F802}{F87B,3,7,1,2}{F813,0,130010}But no, anger won't solve this. We're{F801}fortunate it's a demon they want slain.{F801}Let us strike down this Koga Saburo.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 The demon turned into a huge slab{F801}of stone...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 The demon turned into a huge slab{F801}of stone...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,1,400051}Congratulations on completing the quest.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,1,400051}Congratulations on completing the quest.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 The accented manager quickly approached{F801}the Samurai.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 The accented manager quickly approached{F801}the Samurai.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Accented manager\0{F87A,111}{F813,0,130017}Hahahah! You're crazy!{F801}{F802}{F813,0,130018}Heh, now we can sell Reds here!{F801}Cha-ching!{F801}{F802}{F813,0,130019}Oh, damn, almost forgot.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Accented manager\0{F87A,111}{F813,0,130017}Hahahah! You're crazy!{F801}{F802}{F813,0,130018}Heh, now we can sell Reds here!{F801}Cha-ching!{F801}{F802}{F813,0,130019}Oh, damn, almost forgot.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 The accented manager hastily recovered{F801}something from the stone pile.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 The accented manager hastily recovered{F801}something from the stone pile.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,2,1,1}{F87B,5,10,1,2}{F813,0,130020}Now, if you please... take us to{F801}our fellow.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,2,1,1}{F87B,5,10,1,2}{F813,0,130020}Now, if you please... take us to{F801}our fellow.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Accented manager\0{F87A,111}{F813,0,130021}Hold on there. I just gotta report{F801}this in to Roppongi.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Accented manager\0{F87A,111}{F813,0,130021}Hold on there. I just gotta report{F801}this in to Roppongi.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 The accented manager started to operate{F801}something in his hand as he walked away{F801}from the Samurai.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 The accented manager started to operate{F801}something in his hand as he walked away{F801}from the Samurai.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,5}{F87B,5,1,1,3}{F87B,3,12,1,2}{F813,0,130022}Where is he going? Why can he not{F801}simply have his conversation here?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,5}{F87B,5,1,1,3}{F87B,3,12,1,2}{F813,0,130022}Where is he going? Why can he not{F801}simply have his conversation here?{F801}

entry.source: 〉 The accented manager jogged back to{F801}the Samurai...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 The accented manager jogged back to{F801}the Samurai...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Accented manager\0{F87A,111}{F813,0,130023}Lucky you. Mr. Tayama's agreed to{F801}meet ya at the Hills building in{F801}Roppongi.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Accented manager\0{F87A,111}{F813,0,130023}Lucky you. Mr. Tayama's agreed to{F801}meet ya at the Hills building in{F801}Roppongi.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,3,1,1}{F813,0,130024}The "Hills," you say? And that's{F801}where our fellow is...?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,3,1,1}{F813,0,130024}The "Hills," you say? And that's{F801}where our fellow is...?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Accented manager\0{F87A,111}{F813,0,130025}You betcha... Alive, though? That{F801}I don't know about.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Accented manager\0{F87A,111}{F813,0,130025}You betcha... Alive, though? That{F801}I don't know about.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 Jonathan suddenly grabbed the manager{F801}by the collar.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 Jonathan suddenly grabbed the manager{F801}by the collar.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Accented manager\0{F87A,111}{F813,0,130026}Wh-What the hell, man...? I was just{F801}screwin' with ya. Don't get all bent{F801}outta shape, okay?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Accented manager\0{F87A,111}{F813,0,130026}Wh-What the hell, man...? I was just{F801}screwin' with ya. Don't get all bent{F801}outta shape, okay?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,2,1,1}{F813,0,130027}If not for your hostage, I would have{F801}cut you down where you stood...!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,2,1,1}{F813,0,130027}If not for your hostage, I would have{F801}cut you down where you stood...!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Accented manager\0{F87A,111}{F813,0,130028}I-If you're that worried, why don't{F801}ya go see him already, huh?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Accented manager\0{F87A,111}{F813,0,130028}I-If you're that worried, why don't{F801}ya go see him already, huh?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,4,1,1}{F87B,5,8,1,2}{F813,0,130029}*whistle* Jonathan's in rare form.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,4,1,1}{F87B,5,8,1,2}{F813,0,130029}*whistle* Jonathan's in rare form.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,7,1,2}{F87B,5,10,1,2}{F813,0,130030}The Hills building in Roppongi,{F801}was it? Let us be on our way...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,7,1,2}{F87B,5,10,1,2}{F813,0,130030}The Hills building in Roppongi,{F801}was it? Let us be on our way...{F801}

entry.source: 〉 What will you do?{F801}
entry.target: 〉 What will you do?{F801}

entry.source: Challenge Koga Saburo{F801}Walk away{F801}
entry.target: Challenge Koga Saburo{F801}Walk away{F801}

entry.source: 〉 {F843,0} and his fellow Samurai{F801}walked up to Koga Saburo.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 {F843,0} and his fellow Samurai{F801}walked up to Koga Saburo.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,2,1,1}{F813,0,130012}Koga Saburo... I am afraid that{F801}circumstances have led us inexorably{F801}here to claim your head!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,2,1,1}{F813,0,130012}Koga Saburo... I am afraid that{F801}circumstances have led us inexorably{F801}here to claim your head!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,5,1,1}{F813,0,130013}There are no hard feelings, I assure{F801}you...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,5,1,1}{F813,0,130013}There are no hard feelings, I assure{F801}you...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Koga Saburo\0{F87A,-388}{F813,0,130014}Tayama's dogs, eh?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Koga Saburo\0{F87A,-388}{F813,0,130014}Tayama's dogs, eh?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Koga Saburo\0{F87A,-388}{F813,0,130015}If you insist on opposing me, I won't{F801}make it easy for you.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Koga Saburo\0{F87A,-388}{F813,0,130015}If you insist on opposing me, I won't{F801}make it easy for you.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 Koga Saburo is standing in front of{F801}the entrance to Club Milton.{F801}{F802}〉 What will you do?{F801}
entry.target: 〉 Koga Saburo is standing in front of{F801}the entrance to Club Milton.{F801}{F802}〉 What will you do?{F801}

entry.source: 〉 A huge pile of stone that was once{F801}Koga Saburo is here.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 A huge pile of stone that was once{F801}Koga Saburo is here.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Accented manager\0{F87A,111}{F813,1,405422}H-Hey, Samurai. Still here in Shibuya,{F801}huh...?{F801}{F802}You oughtta go to Roppongi. Don't{F801}wanna keep your boy waitin'.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Accented manager\0{F87A,111}{F813,1,405422}H-Hey, Samurai. Still here in Shibuya,{F801}huh...?{F801}{F802}You oughtta go to Roppongi. Don't{F801}wanna keep your boy waitin'.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Accented manager\0{F87A,155}{F813,1,405423}Hey, Samurai. What, you're back here{F801}in Shibuya?{F801}{F802}Thanks to you, red pill business{F801}is boomin'! We got a full house.{F801}Can't thank ya enough.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Accented manager\0{F87A,155}{F813,1,405423}Hey, Samurai. What, you're back here{F801}in Shibuya?{F801}{F802}Thanks to you, red pill business{F801}is boomin'! We got a full house.{F801}Can't thank ya enough.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Accented manager\0{F87A,155}...But ya still can't come in.{F801}{F802}I mean, ya beat Koga Saburo. Imagine{F801}what'd happen if you hung around the{F801}dance floor...{F801}{F802}Every jumped-up demon would be on{F801}your ass inside two seconds.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Accented manager\0{F87A,155}...But ya still can't come in.{F801}{F802}I mean, ya beat Koga Saburo. Imagine{F801}what'd happen if you hung around the{F801}dance floor...{F801}{F802}Every jumped-up demon would be on{F801}your ass inside two seconds.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Accented manager\0{F87A,155}And that'd make the other customers{F801}nervous, see.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Accented manager\0{F87A,155}And that'd make the other customers{F801}nervous, see.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Accented manager\0{F87A,155}......{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Accented manager\0{F87A,155}......{F801}

entry.source: 〉 The accented manager is operating some{F801}sort of hand-held device...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 The accented manager is operating some{F801}sort of hand-held device...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Accented manager\0{F87A,155}...Hm?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Accented manager\0{F87A,155}...Hm?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Accented manager\0{F87A,155}{F813,1,405422}Hey, Samurai. What brings ya here{F801}to Shibuya?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Accented manager\0{F87A,155}{F813,1,405422}Hey, Samurai. What brings ya here{F801}to Shibuya?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Accented manager\0{F87A,155}We suddenly got a surge of demon{F801}customers. It's been busy as hell.{F801}{F802}We're runnin' low on Reds, and the{F801}extra shipment ain't arrived yet, so{F801}I been trying to reach Mr. Tayama...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Accented manager\0{F87A,155}We suddenly got a surge of demon{F801}customers. It's been busy as hell.{F801}{F802}We're runnin' low on Reds, and the{F801}extra shipment ain't arrived yet, so{F801}I been trying to reach Mr. Tayama...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Accented manager\0{F87A,155}Which is all to say, I'm too busy{F801}to talk right now.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Accented manager\0{F87A,155}Which is all to say, I'm too busy{F801}to talk right now.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Accented manager\0{F87A,155}{F813,1,405422}Yo, Samurai. Visitin' Shibuya again,{F801}are ya?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Accented manager\0{F87A,155}{F813,1,405422}Yo, Samurai. Visitin' Shibuya again,{F801}are ya?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Accented manager\0{F87A,155}That reminds me. Heard Koga Saburo{F801}got beat again.{F801}{F802}Well, it's a good thing he died out{F801}in Ichigaya.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Accented manager\0{F87A,155}That reminds me. Heard Koga Saburo{F801}got beat again.{F801}{F802}Well, it's a good thing he died out{F801}in Ichigaya.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Accented manager\0{F87A,155}If he turned into a rock here, it'd{F801}get in the way of our customers.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Accented manager\0{F87A,155}If he turned into a rock here, it'd{F801}get in the way of our customers.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 Humans and demons are enjoying music{F801}and Reds together...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 Humans and demons are enjoying music{F801}and Reds together...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,0,400051}Congratulations on completing the quest.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,0,400051}Congratulations on completing the quest.{F801}
